title: Integrations Optimization
summary: Direct export flows for NetSuite/Intacct/Xero; better logging and error handling; robust queuing.
details: Optimized integration workflows with improved error handling, robust queuing mechanisms, and comprehensive logging for better observability and debugging.

title: Monitoring & Alerting
summary: Grafana + Sentry dashboards and alerts; rapid production issue resolution.
details: Comprehensive monitoring solution using Grafana dashboards and Sentry alerts to enable rapid production issue identification and resolution.

title: Cross-System Synchronization
summary: Improved sync flows between internal platforms and accounting systems; handled deletions efficiently.
details: Enhanced synchronization processes between internal platforms and external accounting systems with efficient handling of data deletions and updates.
